mapper.select: select ordernum from sys_permission WHERE type='menu' and ordernum not in ( select DISTINCT(t2.ordernum) from sys_permission as t1 JOIN sys_permission as t2 ON t1.ordernum > t2.ordernum where t1.type='menu' and t2.type='menu' )

select ordernum from sys_permission WHERE type='permission' and ordernum not in ( select DISTINCT(t2.ordernum) from sys_permission as t1 JOIN sys_permission as t2 ON t1.ordernum > t2.ordernum where t1.type='permission' and t2.type='permission' )
select sys_permission.id,sys_permission.pid,sys_permission.title from sys_permission join sys_role_permission on sys_permission.id=sys_role_permission.pid where sys_role_permission.rid=#{roleid}

SELECT DISTINCT sys_permission.* FROM sys_user JOIN sys_role_user ON sys_role_user.uid =sys_user.id JOIN sys_role_permission ON sys_role_permission.rid=sys_role_user.rid JOIN sys_permission ON sys_permission.id=sys_role_permission.pid WHERE sys_user.id=#{userid} and sys_permission.type=#{type}
